upcomingEvents.title: Introduction to AWS Cloud and AWS Cloud Clubs
upcomingEvents.description: Discover the basics of AWS Cloud and learn how AWS Cloud Clubs can help you gain practical skills, collaborate with peers, and explore cloud career opportunities.

upcomingEvents.title: AWS Capture the Flag
upcomingEvents.description: Test your AWS skills in a fun, competitive environment where you solve cloud-based challenges and sharpen your problem-solving abilities.
